title: The Sinners of Saint Amos
description: We're ready to die for the sins of our fathers, but is she?An #unconventional love story with a #whychoose twist.This boxset includes all three books in the Sinners of Saint Amos series and a BONUS EPILOGUE not available anywhere else!Their Kingdom ComeTheir Will be DoneDeliver us from Evil.This is a DARK #whychoose bully romance that contains strong language, violence, and situations some may find triggering.No cheating. HEA guaranteed.
author: Logan Fox
